name: Blaster Deflection
Lore: 'A Jedi can anticipate the actions of his opponent and let the Force control his actions, causing him to effortlessly deflect an opponent''s attacks.',
Text: 'USED: Cancel an attempt to use a character weapon to target your character of ability > 4.LOST: If your character of ability > 4 with a lightsaber was just targeted by a blaster, use 3 Force to re-target that blaster to an opponent''s character present.',
